subtitle: A delicious way to serve bananas cooked in a light batter.

method.text: Mix together the brandy and lemon juice in a shallow dish.
Peel the bananas and cut each into 3 chunks. Stir into the brandy liquid and leave to macerate for 20 min.

Meanwhile, prepare the batte: Sift the flour and salt into a large bowl. Beat in the beaten egg, butter and milk and mix until the batter is smooth. Whisk the egg white until stiff, but not dry and fold lightly into the batter.

Spread the flour out onto a large plate. Heat the oil in a deep frying pan to 180°C / 350F. Drain the bananas on kitchen paper and roll in the flour to coat. Dip each piece into the prepared batter and carefully lower, in 2-3 batches, into the pan and deep fry for 3-4 min or until crisp and golden.
Drain the banana fritters thoroughly on kitchen paper. Dredge with icing sugar and serve immediately.

title: Spanish banana fritters
